TextLibrary.Text: Sir Albion
Father! I have a message for you from Bartonia.
Father! I have a message for you from Bartonia.
Father! I have a message for you from Bartonia.
Father! I have a message for you from Bartonia.
Ah... I have been expecting this. You did well to reach here safely.
Ah... I have been expecting this. You did well to reach here safely.
Ah... I have been expecting this. You did well to reach here safely.
Ah... I have been expecting this. You did well to reach here safely.
I was attacked on the way here, but I managed to fight them off.
I was attacked on the way here, but I managed to fight them off.
I was attacked on the way here, but I managed to fight them off.
I was attacked on the way here, but I managed to fight them off.
You did, eh? Impressive for one so young.
You did, eh? Impressive for one so young.
You did, eh? Impressive for one so young.
You did, eh? Impressive for one so young.
Thank you, sir.
Thank you, sir.
Thank you, sir.
Thank you, sir.
Here... I have something that might help you. Take this Longsword. It will serve you well if trouble strikes again.
Here... I have something that might help you. Take this Longsword. It will serve you well if trouble strikes again.
Here... I have something that might help you. Take this Longsword. It will serve you well if trouble strikes again.
Here... I have something that might help you. Take this Longsword. It will serve you well if trouble strikes again.
Thank you, father, I'm sure it will. If I might ask... what was so important about this message?
Thank you, father, I'm sure it will. If I might ask... what was so important about this message?
Thank you, father, I'm sure it will. If I might ask... what was so important about this message?
Thank you, father, I'm sure it will. If I might ask... what was so important about this message?
Indeed. You might ask...
Indeed. You might ask...
Indeed. You might ask...
Indeed. You might ask...
Father! I risked my life for this! I think I have a right to know.
Father! I risked my life for this! I think I have a right to know.
Father! I risked my life for this! I think I have a right to know.
Father! I risked my life for this! I think I have a right to know.
I suppose you are right. I'll tell you a little, but only because you are my son and I trust you.
I suppose you are right. I'll tell you a little, but only because you are my son and I trust you.
I suppose you are right. I'll tell you a little, but only because you are my daughter and I trust you.
I suppose you are right. I'll tell you a little, but only because you are my daughter and I trust you.
There are rumors of a secret cult far to the north, on the borders of Theira...
There are rumors of a secret cult far to the north, on the borders of Theira...
There are rumors of a secret cult far to the north, on the borders of Theira...
There are rumors of a secret cult far to the north, on the borders of Theira...
We know little about them, but they seem to be servants of Lord Bane, the Dark Horseman of Death...
We know little about them, but they seem to be servants of Lord Bane, the Dark Horseman of Death...
We know little about them, but they seem to be servants of Lord Bane, the Dark Horseman of Death...
We know little about them, but they seem to be servants of Lord Bane, the Dark Horseman of Death...
This message contains details of a location where they often meet.
This message contains details of a location where they often meet.
This message contains details of a location where they often meet.
This message contains details of a location where they often meet.
I have a score to settle with this cult. I want to help you track them down.
I have a score to settle with this cult. I want to help you track them down.
I have a score to settle with this cult. I want to help you track them down.
I have a score to settle with this cult. I want to help you track them down.
You are still a novice. Have patience! There will be time enough for fighting later!
You are still a novice. Have patience! There will be time enough for fighting later!
You are still a novice. Have patience! There will be time enough for fighting later!
You are still a novice. Have patience! There will be time enough for fighting later!
As you wish, father. But rest assured... I'll be back.
As you wish, father. But rest assured... I'll be back.
